trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref> objects to and from various other representations.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，將<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode"></xref>物件與其他各種表示相互轉換。

trans-unit.source: For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別和[How to︰ 實作類型轉換器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of a TreeNodeConverter.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 您絕對不要建立 TreeNodeConverter 的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 請改為呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A><xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>方法</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>基底類別</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>中的範例

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TreeNodeConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出這個轉換器是否可以轉換成指定的目的型別使用內容的物件。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
trans-unit.target: `context`參數可以用來擷取這個轉換子就從叫用的環境的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: This can be `null`, so always check.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，物件上的屬性可能會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示您想要轉換成的型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個轉換子可以執行轉換，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值物件轉換成指定的型別，並使用指定的內容和文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: If null is passed, the current culture is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳遞 null，則會假設目前的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>轉換。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the value parameter to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要轉換值參數。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示已轉換的值。</xref:System.Object>
